item.title: Swift 4 Drawing
item.description: Learning how to use Swift 4 and Quartz / Core Graphics. Much of the information found online only go to Swift 3, but Swift 4 APIs have changed to be more Swift-like. This is good, but makes it hard to find documentation online that works. What is Quartz 2D / Core Graphics Making Your Own View You need to subclass NSView 1class CircleView: NSView { 2 override func draw(_ dirtyRect: NSRect) { 3 4 } 5} Adding your custom view to the storyboard Use Custom View On the Identity Inspector tab, make sure to set the Class, to your view’s class.
